description: When they renamed their software product it wasn't possible to update it anymore. Bit of a failure.
summary: Messing up with renaming their product

description: pretty app, some features are only available when you pay for it. but the free functionality is also great.

Find something else to use, there are much better out there.

1.. This is not a program, this is a web connector that simply connects you to the web where you have to pay for your subscription before you begin using the program
2.. The program is not remotely open source
3.. This is an 'upgrade / update' to their XMind8 software but you are unable to upgrade or update and previous 'maps' are not properly compatible and a proper 'upgrade' is not possible
summary: Not open source / not a program
